Name: assign_worker_to_task
Description: Binary decision to assign a specific worker to a specific task.

Name: select_feature_for_sprint
Description: Binary decision to include a specific user story in the upcoming sprint backlog.

Name: select_feature_for_release
Description: Binary decision to include a specific feature in a release plan.

Name: assign_story_points
Description: The number of story points to assign to a specific user story.

Name: set_worker_availability
Description: The percentage of time a worker is available for project work in a sprint.

Name: set_sprint_duration
Description: The duration of a sprint in days.

Name: assign_priority_to_feature
Description: The priority level assigned to a feature.

Name: set_blocker_severity
Description: The severity level assigned to a identified blocker.

Name: set_team_size
Description: The number of workers assigned to a team.

Name: set_project_budget
Description: The total budget allocated to the project.

Name: assign_skill_to_task
Description: Binary decision that a task requires a specific skill.
